title: Content Intelligence Web Page
description: Web page details and containing web elements

xdm:id.title: Page Id
xdm:id.description: The unique ID of the web page.

xdm:modifyDate.description: The server date and time when the resource was last modified in the repository, such as when a new version of an asset is uploaded or a directory's child resource is added or removed. The date time property should conform to ISO 8601 standard. An example form is "2004-10-23T12:00:00-06:00".

xdm:template.title: Template
xdm:template.description: The path to the page's template

xdm:language.title: Language
xdm:language.description: The language of of the page

xdm:tags.title: Web page tags
xdm:tags.description: The page tags and their confidence score in subunitary value format. A confidence score of 1 means the tag is predefined. Other values represent predicted confidence.

xdm:elements.title: Web elements
xdm:elements.description: The list of containing web elements.
